name: ExerBeat
description:
ExerBeat makes working out fun and easy as you move to the rhythm in over 150 riveting exercise, plus a built-in support system of trainers will make sure you keep working out!

With a variety of workout categories including Boxercising, Latin Dance, Yoga, and more, there's something for everyone!

Features

• 155 exercises covering 8 categories
• Real time in-game instructions per exercise
• 2 player vs. multiplayer for most exercises
• Party Fitness games for kids
